articles.description: A recent study reveals that "superagers," older adults with exceptional memory, maintain superior white matter integrity in their brains. This preservation helps them resist age-related cognitive decline, offering insights into potential strategies for health…

articles.author: Tim Newman
articles.title: IBD and Parkinson's disease: Study discovers genetic link - Medical News Today
articles.description: Researchers identified new genes and pathways that are important in both Parkinson's disease and inflammatory bowel disease (IBD).
articles.content:
• Previous research has identified associations between Parkinsons disease and inflammatory bowel disease.
  • A new study examines the genetic link that underpins this relationship.
